name: Certificate - Master Ability
description: Certificate needed to learn a Master Ability. Only main classes can learn this skill. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or stored in a warehouse

name: Feather of Blessing
description: Dimensional item\\nYou can resurrect right away at the spot where you get killed if you have the Feather of Blessing. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Dimensional Merchant

name: Adventurer's Scroll of Escape
description: Magic scroll that moves you to the nearest village. Item for beginner adventurers that cannot be exchanged or dropped
